item.title: How Does Https Actually Work
item.description: 翻译自 How does https actually work 。 HTTPS is simply your standard HTTP protocol slathered with a generous layer of delicious SSL/TLS encryption goodness. Unless something goes horribly wrong (and it can), it prevents people like the infamous Eve from viewing or modifying the requests that make up

item.title: Encrypt and Security
item.description: 上周有同学分享了一下加密解密，感觉自己学到了一些东西，记录一下。 加密 & 解密 有时候面试的时候会遇到有人
